name: Flappy N-Gon
description:
Space to... flap, Escape to exit. Your standard Flappyclone, with a twist! You can hit the obstacles, just don't go off screen!

I'm looking for feedback to make sure that I'm following Unity best practices and not making too big of a mess of it. I can't test on the Mac platform, so I didn't build for it ^v^

Source can be found here! https://github.com/mz2212/FlappyCube
